events.name: PostCreated
events.description: This event signifies that a new post has been created.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: This event indicates that an existing post has been updated.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: This event signals that a post has been deleted from the system.

events.name: PostPublished
events.description: This event signifies that a post has been published and is visible to users.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: This event signifies that a new post has been created.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: This event indicates that an existing post has been updated.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: This event signals that a post has been deleted from the system.

commands.name: PublishPost
commands.description: This event signifies that a post has been published and is visible to users.

integrationPoints.name: UserService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the User Service to manage post authors.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration to send notifications upon post creation or updates.
